snippet: John Isner, who at No. 14 is the top-ranked American, has parted ways which Craig Boynton, who had served as his coach since March 2009.
lead_paragraph: John Isner, who at No. 14 is the top-ranked American, has parted ways which Craig Boynton, who had served as his coach since March 2009.

headline.seo: John Isner Parts Ways With Coach Craig Boynton
